title: Plot Shipboard DAS Data
text: CruzPlot R package contains GUI creating maps, plotting data, performing basic data summaries data files “DAS” format produced WinCruz.

title: Plot Shipboard DAS Data
text: can install released version CruzPlot CRAN : can install developmental version CruzPlot GitHub. use development version CruzPlot, recommended install development version swfscDAS well: updating CruzPlot, recommended create save new workspaces, rather using workspaces saved previous version CruzPlot. Please contact developer issues.
code: install.packages("CruzPlot") # install.packages("remotes") # Install remotes package if needed remotes::install_github("smwoodman/swfscDAS", build_vignettes = TRUE) remotes::install_github("smwoodman/CruzPlot")

title: CruzPlot 1.4.8
text: CruzPlot now depends R >= 4.0.0 consistency across DAS packages Updated License CC0 consistency across DAS packages

title: CruzPlot 1.4.7
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-05 Fixed bug planned transects properly load saved workspace Fixed issues save map feature

title: CruzPlot 1.4.6
text: CRAN release: 2021-09-03 Fixed bug caused map range brush interactive plot labels work correctly Added ‘Main Hawaiian Islands’ default range button

title: CruzPlot 1.4.5
text: CRAN release: 2021-03-01 Fixed bug stay current shiny package - changes user functionality

title: CruzPlot 1.4.4
text: CRAN release: 2021-01-25 Ensure CruzPlot fails gracefully NOAA server available marmap::getNOAA.bathy attempting download bathymetric data

title: CruzPlot 1.4.3
text: CRAN release: 2021-01-11 Fixed test stay current shiny v1.6 - changes user functionality

title: CruzPlot 1.4.2
text: CRAN release: 2020-09-07 Fixed documentation added tests CRAN submission

title: CruzPlot 1.4.1
text: Fixed bug made CruzPlot display incorrect colors sightings (#2)

title: CruzPlot 1.4.0
text: Catch changes made swfscDAS. CruzPlot now depends swfscDAS version >= 0.3 Fixed bug tabular sighting output display uninformative error message

title: CruzPlot 1.3.0
text: Catch changes made swfscDAS. CruzPlot now depends swfscDAS version >= 0.2 Fixed bug plotting effort lines - longitude coordinates get transformed correctly map spanned 180th meridian Fixed bugs interactive labeling CruzPlot now filters sightings effort map range filters ensure error messages accurate. Also removed requirement selected species codes must sighting satisfies given map range filter.

title: CruzPlot 1.2.0
text: Fixed bug specifying scale bar position Fixed bug tabular sighting output, added table summarizing total number (unfiltered) sightings.

title: CruzPlot 1.1.0
text: User can now change map range (zoom ) drawing box mouse cursor map range changed, ) scale bar length now automatically update b) scale bar position automatically updates position outside new map range Fixed two bugs caused errors message appear plot window changing color scheme Added local documentation various arguments used reading processing DAS data CruzPlot now verbosely removes, .e. displays pop-window, sighting effort line removed one 1) NA position coordinates 2) NA filter values Mode effort type filters available sighting filters strictly ‘effort’ sightings plotted sighting effort Beaufort filters applied minimum maximum values 0 9, respectively. Practically speaking, means records NA Beaufort values can plotted desired, relevant effort sightings Fixed bug caused extraneous NA values filter information sighting effort line NA DAS data. default, effort legend included plotting simplified effort plotting detailed effort Beaufort, users enter many Beaufort colors maximum Beaufort filter value plus one Added ability plot resight events one species code selected

title: CruzPlot 1.0.0
text: Reorganized CruzPlot tabs sections cleaner display Made saved workspace robust - note means workspaces saved past versions CruzPlot longer compatible

title: CruzPlot 1.0.0
text: Made map size dynamic responsive window size, give user dynamic control map window height Users can specify resolution saved map Fixed bug tick labels style ‘120’ display negative values Added buttons five default map ranges Removed StarterVals.csv - functionality replaced default range buttons able save multiple workspaces Users direct control download import bathymetric files depth shading

title: CruzPlot 1.0.0
text: CruzPlot now uses swfscDAS processing DAS data Users can load species codes file wish use default SpCodes.dat Removed CPOD plotting functionality Sightings can plotted event code (S/K/M/G/p) filtered mode (C/P) effort type (S/N/F) Simplified effort can filtered effort type Effort lines explicitly filtered within map range Users control effort line properties legend parameters Cruise number filters dynamic dropdown cruise numbers DAS data Interactive sighting effort maps combined view label (hover click) functionality

title: CruzPlot 0.1.0
text: Initial version - CruzPlot converted collection scripts R package
